title: Sekai Meisaku Douwa: Wow! Maerchen Oukoku
synopsis: Based on Western tales from the usual suspects: 1001 Nights, C. Perrault, Beaumont, J. & W. Grimm, H. C. Andersen, C. Collodi, English fairytale, H. Pyle, L. Carrol, J. Swift, A. Dumas, E. T. A Hoffman, L. F. Baum, and J. Spyri.
staff: [['Endou, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']], ['Kaizawa, Yukio', ['Episode Director']], ['Umezawa, Atsutoshi', ['Episode Director']], ['Ishikawa, Yasuo', ['Episode Director']]]
